sections.title: Porject Overview
sections.content: WishfulBazaar is a leading e-commerce company aiming to strengthen its data-driven decision-making by developing a company-wide sales dashboard. Despite having access to rich customer and transaction data, the company lacks a centralized view of performance across regions, products, and customer segments. At the request of CEO Mr. Ronaldinho and under the direction of Head of Data Mr. Neymar, this project focuses on building an interactive Tableau dashboard to uncover key insights—such as declining profit trends, high abandoned sales, and shifting customer behaviors. The goal is to empower executives with actionable metrics and visualizations that improve profitability, customer targeting, and operational efficiency.

content.title: Business Understanding
content.description: Identified key business questions through initial data exploration and stakeholder goals, focusing on sales trends, customer behavior, and campaign effectiveness.

content.title: Data Preparation & Cleaning
content.description: Imported and cleaned datasets in Tableau, ensuring correct data types and consistent formatting to support accurate analysis.

content.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
content.description: Explored sales patterns, customer demographics, and product performance to uncover trends and anomalies across time, region, and category.

content.title: Metric Calculation
content.description: Created calculated fields for key metrics such as Potential Sales, Abandoned Sales, Return Sales, and Success Sales, along with YoY growth and cumulative profit.

content.title: Data Visualization
content.description: Built interactive charts and maps in Tableau, including dual-axis line charts, ranked bar charts, pie charts, and scatter plots with clustering.

content.title: Insight & Recommendation
content.description: Generated actionable insights and formulated strategic recommendations based on analysis results to improve sales performance and customer engagement.

content.title: Dashboard Design
content.description: Designed an executive-friendly dashboard with real-time filters and clear visual hierarchy to support strategic decision-making.

content.title: Profitability Is Slipping Year Over Year
content.description: WishfulBazaar’s profitability is on a downward trajectory. In 2022, profit dropped by 14.59% compared to the baseline year, and by 2023, the decline deepened to 33.75%. Despite strong sales, rising costs or inefficiencies may be eroding margins—signaling a need for operational recalibration.

content.title: Nearly $400K Lost to Abandoned and Returned Sales
content.description: Sales potential is high, but not fully realized. While successful transactions dominate, abandoned carts and returned items account for a significant $400K in lost revenue. These missed opportunities suggest friction in the purchase journey or post-purchase dissatisfaction—both of which are solvable.

content.title: Electronics Dominate Revenue Streams
content.description: Electronics are the powerhouse of WishfulBazaar’s catalog. Televisions and laptops lead the charge, while top-performing home appliances—also electronics—reinforce the category’s dominance. This trend highlights a clear customer preference and a strategic area for continued investment.
content.alt: Chart of churn by bill amount

content.title: Customer’s Prefer Card Transaction
content.description: A striking 65.4% of customers prefer using bank cards, with both credit and debit cards ranking highest. Covering EDC or transfer fees could further boost satisfaction and conversion rates. This small operational tweak could yield outsized gains in loyalty and repeat purchases.

content.title: Shopping Behavior Varies by Country
content.description: Customers from China, India, and Canada complete purchases more quickly, while those from Australia, Japan, the UK, and the US take longer. This suggests that certain regions may benefit from more intuitive navigation, clearer product information, or localized UX enhancements.
content.alt: Chart of churn correlation with data cap breaches

content.title: Regional Revenue Leaders and Laggards
content.description: Canada, Australia, Italy, China, and the USA each generate over $130K in revenue, making them top-performing markets. In contrast, Spain, India, Japan, and the UK underperform—warranting deeper analysis into cultural preferences, marketing effectiveness, or logistical barriers.
content.alt: Comparison of churn by subscription type

content.title: Boost Profitability
points: Investigate declining profit trends and identify operational inefficiencies.
Reduce abandoned and returned sales to recover nearly $400K in lost revenue.

content.title: Enhance Customer Experience
points: Tailor store layouts by region: For fast shoppers place essential products up front; For slower shoppers provide spacious aisles and clear signage.
Support older customers with staff assistance while maintaining a seamless experience for younger shoppers.

content.title: Optimize Product Strategy
points: Extend service periods for electronics to improve satisfaction and build loyalty.

content.title: Refine Market Penetration
points: Evaluate underperforming countries (Spain, India, Japan, UK) to understand barriers and improve demand.

content.title: Improve Payment Convenience
points: Enhance banking options (e.g., cover EDC or transfer fees) to support the 65.4% of customers who prefer card payments.

content.title: Executive Dashboard
content.description: An interactive, high-level dashboard tailored for leadership to monitor profit trends, regional revenue, and customer behavior. Designed with clarity and strategic focus, it helps executives track performance and make informed decisions quickly across the business.

content.title: Sales Performance Dashboard for Sales & Marketing Team
content.description: A detailed dashboard for sales and marketing teams to analyze product performance, abandoned and returned sales, and payment preferences. It supports campaign optimization and conversion improvement through clear visualizations and real-time filtering.
